name: Squid Game Red light Green light (Rage Edition)
name_original: Squid Game Red light Green light (Rage Edition)
description:
WASD to Move

Left Mouse button to punch

Escape key on death or win screen to quit, space bar to play again

This is my first downloadable game as a beginner game developer so it might have bugs lol (the project was worked on fairly quickly)

This is for entertainment purposes only, my version of Squid Game is just a parody clone and the official rights belong to Netflix.
